All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    This panel contains all the visual components of the game board and cards.
    It also contains the logic for generating card pairs in single player mode (card pairs are generated on the server side in multiplayer mode), checking whether opened pair is a match and updating the score on the score board via Controller.
    Client
    This class is responsible for communication with the multiplayer server.
    ClientApp  
    ClientHandler
    Communicates with the client which was assigned to this specific ClientHandler.
    Controller
    Controller for the client application.
    Database
    Contains methods for connecting/disconnecting and executing CRUD operations on MySQL Database.
    FormListener
    Used by LogInRegistrationFrame class in order to pass user login and user registration info to the Controller.
    GameFinishedJob
    Displays the information about achieved result on the ScorePanel upon finishing single player game.
    Attempts to insert achieved result to the database.
    This job is executed on a new Thread in order to prevent the main thread getting blocked in case database is not responding.
    GameFrame
    Main game frame.
    GameModeFrame
    Game mode frame - offers the client the choice between Single player and multiplayer mode.
    Also contains the text input field for multiplayer server's IP address.
    HighScoresFrame
    Displays high scores of all the users.
    ICommand  
    LogInEvent
    An object used to store user login information (username and password).
    LogInForm
    Used to collect, store and pass on user login information (username and password) for further processing.
    LogInRegistrationFrame
    Window which contains user login and registration forms.
    MenuPanel
    Menu panel which is located in top left corner of the main window.
    MultiplayerServer
    Server client for Memory Game.
    MyScoresFrame
    Displays scores of the current user.
    RegistrationEvent
    An object used to store user registration information (username, password and confirmation password).
    RegistrationForm
    Used to collect, store and pass on user registration information (username, password and password confirmation) for further processing.
    RematchCmd
    Sends a rematch request to the opponent upon execution.
    RestartGameCmd
    Disposes the current GameFrame window and opens a new one upon execution.
    ScorePanel
    Displays score(s) for the player(s) and information about game outcome.
    ServerApp  
    ServerControlFrame
    GUI for Memory Game server
    ServerController  
    ShowHighScoresJob
    Opens a new JFrame and displays all saved High scores of all the users.
    ShowUserScoresJob
    Opens a new JFrame and displays all saved scores for the current user.
    UserForm
    Abstract class which provides a skeleton for LogInForm and RegistrationForm classes.
